Before launching the virtual machine, the wizard calculates the approximate cost of the machine you are going to launch. When the VM is successfully launched, you will receive an email confirmation.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please remember that all non-personal virtual resources are billed to the project to which they are assigned.
